quote: I have heard all that you have had to say to me on your problems.You ask me what to do about them.It is my view that your real problem is that you are a member of the human race.Face that one first.
quote_letters: I HAVE HEARD ALL THAT YOU HAVE HAD TO SAY TO ME ON YOUR PROBLEMSYOU ASK ME WHAT TO DO ABOUT THEMIT IS MY VIEW THAT YOUR REAL PROBLEM IS THAT YOU ARE A MEMBER OF THE HUMAN RACEFACE THAT ONE FIRST
